courseUploadTip1: Set the Course Price option or make it free.
courseUploadTip2: Standard size for the course thumbnail is 700x430.
courseUploadTip3: Video section controls the course overview video.
courseUploadTip4: Course Builder is where you create & organize a course.
courseUploadTip5: Add Topics in the Course Builder section to create lessons, quizzes, and assignments.
courseUploadTip6: Prerequisites refers to the fundamental courses to complete before taking this particular course.
courseUploadTip7: Information from the Additional Data section shows up on the course single page.
topicNameNote: Topic titles are displayed publicly wherever required. Each topic may contain one or more lessons, quiz and assignments.
topicSummaryNote: Add a summary of short text to prepare students for the activities for the topic. The text is shown on the course page beside the tooltip beside the topic name.
lessonNameNote: Lesson titles are displayed publicly wherever required.
whatWillILearnPlaceholder: Write here the course benefits (One per line)
targetedAudiencePlaceHolder: Target Audience that will benefits from the course (One per line)
requirementsPlaceHolder: Special instructions for the students (One per line)
